mapper.insert: insert into complain (complain_seq, admin_code, m_id, complain_content, complain_classification) values (seq_complain.nextval, #{admin_code}, #{m_id}, #{complain_content}, #{complain_classification})
mapper.select: select c.*, a.admin_work from complain c, admin a where m_id = #{m_id} and c.admin_code = a.admin_code and complain_is_finish = 'Y' order by complain_regdate
